game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Player class is a class that holds each players information. Such as their hand, their team, and whether or not they are the dealer.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Lawton, Dan Schroeder, Aron Ockerse

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean dealer
      A boolean to determine if the player is the dealer
      Card[] hand
      An array of Cards that designates the hand
      Team team
      A enumerated type to hold which team the player belongs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(Team team, Card[] hand)
      A Constructor that sets the players team and hand, while setting dealer to false.
